titleHead: Reasons for appealing - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Your reasons for appealing
dwpExplained: DWP should have explained their decision on your entitlement to PIP in the Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN) or the decision letter they sent you.
readYouMRN: Read your MRN or the decision letter and write what you disagree with and why. Your reasons will be considered by an independent tribunal who are separate from DWP.

error.required: You need to give at least one reason for appealing
